home.name: Murilo Rocha

works.title: Bloch Sphere
works.description: Web development & math as a tool

Habilities.MainText: A strong foundation is essential for any project. I deliver beautiful and intuitive designs that align with your brand's essence. I believe usability and aesthetics go hand-in-hand to make better products.
Using the latest web dev techs, I build pixel-perfect, fast and accessible websites. I specialise in creative interactions and transitions.
This is my most preferred service as it allows the entire website creation—from concept to final site—to be seamless and ultra-fast.

home.SparkMensage: I enjoy designing meaningful experiences for brands & businesses to help them serve their target users.

about.aboutMe: I’m a Brazilian front-end developer with a passion for solving problems and building innovative digital experiences. With expertise in Node.js, Next.js.
about.history: I like to make games in Unity and now I am learning Godot
about.history2: Now I am learning React and Next Js.
about.anotherInspirationsTitle: My development stack is focused on performance & accessibility with delightful interactions.
about.anotherInspirationsText: Apart from my main domain, I also like branding, icon design and minimal illustrations. I am an enthusiast of digital art, motion design & WebGL.
